Usage: PROGRAM NAME UNKNOWN -param2=int ...

===============

stdParams-help   [ 12 parameters, 11 hidden ]
      [-help, -usage]
---------------
test-group1      [ 6 parameters, 1 hidden ]
      [-param1=int, -param1-alt1=int]
      -param2=int, -param2-alt2=int
      [-param4[=Bool] ]
      [-param5=v1|v2]
      [-param6=v2|v1]
